action_on_add.description: If specified, this bi-entity action will be executed on either or both the '**actor**' and the '**target**' upon the '**target**' being added to the set.

action_on_remove.description: If specified, this bi-entity action will be executed on either or both the '**actor**' and the '**target**' upon the '**target**' being removed from the set.
